org.apache.flink.runtime.taskmanager

类 Task.TaskCanceler

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.runtime.taskmanager.Task.TaskCanceler
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    java.lang.Runnable
    封闭类:
    Task

    private static class Task.TaskCanceler
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    This runner calls cancel() on the invokable and periodically interrupts the thread until it has terminated.
